snippet.title: Pathologic 2: Marble Nest - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Marble Nest is out now! Get it on Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/1141960/Pathologic_2_Marble_Nest/

The Town is doomed. As a doctor trying to curb an epidemic, you've lost. But what if Death knocked on your door and offered a chance to do it all again? Would you still struggle, or accept your fate? Make the choice in Pathologic: The Marble Nest, a two-hour spin-off of Pathologic 2.

Marble Nest DLC will be free to everyone who previously owns the game on PC at the time of the DLC release.

#Pathologic #Pathologic2 #MarbleNest
